title: Paper Sample Card, "MERRIMACK PRINTS", 1844
medium:
Medium: paper, cotton
Technique: discharge print (white) on a dark blue ground.
inscribed: Card is titled "Merrimack prints" with a picture of a textile manufactory along a river. Underneath the picture handwritted in pencil, "June 7, 1844". Each of the eight fabric samples is numbered but the numbers are not sequential and several are repeated; there are three '2's, three '3's, one '4' and one '6'.
description: Eight examples of white discharge print on a dark blue ground. Each sample is numbered, but the numbers are not sequential  and several are repeated.

tombstone.epitaph:
Paper Sample Card, "MERRIMACK PRINTS", 1844.Medium: paper, cotton
Technique: discharge print (white) on a dark blue ground.. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-2.
